name: Project CARS - Classic Lotus Track Expansion
name_original: Project CARS - Classic Lotus Track Expansion
description:
Project CARS - Classic Lotus Track Expansion is a simulation-racing game developed by Slightly Mad Studios. It was originally released in 2015. Slightly Mad Studios published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Project CARS - Classic Lotus Track Expansion is available on PC.
